headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Custom Conversion. The name must start with a letter and can include letters, numbers, spaces, underscores, or hyphens. Length limit: 50 characters and cannot contain emoji. Note : Do not specify the name of a standard event. Duplicate names for Custom Conversion within an ad account are not allowed.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The description of the Custom Conversion. Length limit: 500 characters and cannot contain emoji.

parameters.name: event_source_type
parameters.description: Event source type. Enum values: PIXEL : Pixel. APP : App.

parameters.name: event_source_id
parameters.description: Event source ID. When event_source_type is PIXEL , specify a Pixel ID. To obtain IDs of Pixels within your ad account, use /pixel/list/ and check the returned pixel_id . When event_source_type is APP , specify the app platform ID of a Self Attribution Network (SAN) App. To obtain app platform IDs of SAN Apps within your ad account, use /app/list/ . Confirm that the returned self_attribution_enabled for the App is true and check the returned app_platform_id .

parameters.name: optimization_event
parameters.description: The Standard Event to associate with the Custom Conversion. For enum values, see List of values for optimization_event .

parameters.name: custom_event_type
parameters.description: Valid only when event_source_type is PIXEL and the Custom Event has been configured for the Pixel ( event_source_id ). The Custom Event to associate with the Custom Conversion. When you specify a Custom Event for the Custom Conversion, you need to specify the Standard Event to map the event to through optimization_event simultaneously. Custom Events are actions that TikTok partners can define themselves beyond the predefined Standard Events list. To learn more about Custom Events, see About Custom Events in TikTok Ads Manager . To obtain the Custom Events that are configured for a Pixel, use /pixel/list/ and check the returned custom_event_type .

parameters.name: rules
parameters.description: Details of the conversion rules for the Custom Conversion. Only actions that meet these conditions will count as Custom Conversions. Size range: 1-10.

parameters.name: parameter
parameters.description: Parameter. Enum values: BRAND : brand . CONTENT_CATEGORY : content_category . CONTENT_ID : content_id . CONTENT_NAME : content_name . CONTENT_TYPE : content_type . CURRENCY : currency . DESCRIPTION : description . EVENT_ID : event_id . NUM_ITEMS : num_items . PRICE : price . SEARCH_STRING : search_string . STATUS : status . URL : url . VALUE : value .

parameters.name: operator
parameters.description: Operator. When parameter is BRAND , CONTENT_CATEGORY , CONTENT_ID , CONTENT_NAME , CONTENT_TYPE , DESCRIPTION , EVENT_ID , SEARCH_STRING , STATUS , or URL , the enum values are: CONTAIN : Contains. NOT_CONTAIN : Does not contain. START_WITH : Starts with. EQUAL : Is equal to. NOT_EQUAL : Is not equal to. When parameter is NUM_ITEMS , PRICE , or VALUE , the enum values are: EQUAL : Is equal to. NOT_EQUAL : Is not equal to. LT : Is less than. GT : Is greater than. LTE : Is less than or equal to. GTE : Is greater than or equal to. When parameter is CURRENCY , the enum values are: EQUAL : Is equal to. NOT_EQUAL : Is not equal to.

parameters.name: values
parameters.description: Values for the parameter. When parameter is BRAND , CONTENT_CATEGORY , CONTENT_ID , CONTENT_NAME , CONTENT_TYPE , DESCRIPTION , EVENT_ID , SEARCH_STRING , STATUS , URL , the field will be an array of strings, each with a maximum length of 100 characters and up to 100 entries. When parameter is NUM_ITEMS , the field will be an integer between 0 and 1,000,000,000. When parameter is PRICE , VALUE , the field will be a float kept to two decimal places, within the range from 0.00 to 1,000,000,000.00. When parameter is CURRENCY , the field will be an array of strings. To learn about the enum values, see List of currency values .
